SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am32
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am32.controller

Class GamesManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am32.controller.GamesManager
public class GamesManager extends Object
This class represents a manager for all the games that are currently being played. Class is a Singleton, meaning that only one instance of it can be created.

    • getInstance

      Returns:

    • createGame

      public GameController createGame(String creatorName, int playerCount, ServerNodeInterface node) throws InvalidPlayerNumberException
      Creates a new game with the given creator name and player count
      Parameters:
      creatorName - The name of the player that created the game
      playerCount - The number of players that the game will have
      node - The server node associated with the given player
      Returns:
      The GameController of the newly created game
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerNumberException - If the player count is not between 2 and 4

    • accessGame

      public GameController accessGame(String nickname, int gameCode, ServerNodeInterface node) throws GameNotFoundException, FullLobbyException, GameAlreadyStartedException, CTRDuplicateNicknameException
      Adds the player with the given nickname to the game with the given code
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to be added
      gameCode - The code of the game to be accessed
      node - The server node associated with the given player
      Returns:
      The GameController of the game with the given code
      Throws:
      GameNotFoundException - If no game with the given code is found
      FullLobbyException - If the lobby of the game is full
      GameAlreadyStartedException - If the game has already started
      CTRDuplicateNicknameException - If the player with the given nickname is already in the game

    • reconnectToGame

      public GameController reconnectToGame(String nickname, int gameCode, ServerNodeInterface node) throws GameAlreadyEndedException, CTRPlayerNotFoundException, GameNotFoundException, PlayerAlreadyConnectedException, GameNotYetStartedException
      Reconnects the player with the given nickname to the game with the given code
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to be reconnected
      gameCode - The code of the game to be accessed
      node - The server node associated with the given player
      Returns:
      The GameController of the game with the given code
      Throws:
      GameAlreadyEndedException - If the game has already ended
      CTRPlayerNotFoundException - If the player with the given nickname is not found in the game
      GameNotFoundException - If no game with the given code is found
      PlayerAlreadyConnectedException - If the player with the given nickname is already connected to the game
      GameNotYetStartedException - If the game has not yet started

    • getGames

      protected ArrayList<GameController> getGames()
      Return the list of all games that are currently being handled by the server. Used for testing purposes only.
      Returns:
      The list of all games that are currently being handled by the server.

    • clearInstance

      protected void clearInstance()
      Clear the instance of the class. Used for testing purposes only.
